heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. A rising chance of snow showers from the Green Mountains westward; chance to the east, mainly late. Highs in the low to mid 20s. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, with a trace to 2 inches. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, some mid teens northeast. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny southeast, otherwise partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers; an afternoon squall also possible, mainly north. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s, mid to upper 30s southeast. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
